name: @iguhealth/hl7.fhir.r4b.core
title: Hl7 Core resources
description: IGUHEALTH package that contains core hl7 R4B resources.
author: IGUHealth

scripts.generate-index-nonmin: yarn node ../../../packages/cli/lib/iguhealth.js generate index-file --extension .json -p . -r definitions --ignore \*.min.json definitions/profiles-others.json definitions/dataelements.json definitions/extension-definitions.json
scripts.generate-index: yarn node ../../../packages/cli/lib/iguhealth.js generate index-file --extension .min.json -p . -r definitions --ignore definitions/profiles-others.min.json definitions/dataelements.min.json definitions/extension-definitions.min.json
